section: repython.py examples/repython.py Go to the documentation of this file.00001 # Adapted from https://github.com/yunshengtian/DGEMO/blob/master/problems/re.py 00002 # See Tanabe, Ryoji, and Hisao Ishibuchi. "An easy-to-use real-world multi-objective optimization problem suite." Applied Soft Computing (2020): 106078. 00003 # https://arxiv.org/abs/2009.12867 00004 00005 # Modified to work with https://numba.pydata.org/ 00006 # to measure algorithm overhead. 00007 # Returns constraints unmodified, not as weighted sum 00008 # On an AMD 5950x all problems are solved in < 2 sec 00009 00010 # Tested using https://docs.conda.io/en/main/miniconda.html on Linux Mint 21.2 00011 00012 import numpy as np 00013 from fcmaes import mode, modecpp, decpp, de, moretry 00014 from scipy.optimize import Bounds 00015 from numba import njit 00016 00017 import sys 00018 from loguru import logger 00019 00020 logger.remove() 00021 logger.add(sys.stdout, format="{time:HH:mm:ss.SS} | {process} | {level} | {message}", level="INFO") 00022 logger.add("log_{time}.txt", format="{time:HH:mm:ss.SS} | {process} | {level} | {message}", level="INFO") 00023 00024 @njit(fastmath=True) 00025 def closest_value(arr, val): 00026 ''' 00027 Get closest value to val in arr 00028 ''' 00029 return arr[np.argmin(np.abs(arr - val))] 00030 00031 @njit(fastmath=True) 00032 def div(x1, x2): 00033 ''' 00034 Divide x1 / x2, return 0 where x2 == 0 00035 ''' 00036 return x1/x2 if x2 != 0 else 0 00037 00038 @njit(fastmath=True) 00039 def re_1(x): 00040 x1, x2, x3, x4 = x[0], x[1], x[2], x[3] 00041 00042 F = 10 00043 E = 2e5 00044 L = 200 00045 00046 f1 = L * ((2 * x1) + np.sqrt(2.0) * x2 + np.sqrt(x3) + x4) 00047 f2 = (F * L) / E * (div(2.0, x1) + div(2.0 * np.sqrt(2.0), x2) - div(2.0 * np.sqrt(2.0), x3) + div(2.0, x4)) 00048 00049 return np.array([f1,f2]) 00050 00051 @njit(fastmath=True) 00052 def re_2(x, feasible_values): 00053 x1, x2, x3 = x[0], x[1], x[2] 00054 x1 = closest_value(feasible_values, x1) 00055 00056 f1 = (29.4 * x1) + (0.6 * x2 * x3) 00057 00058 g = np.array( 00059 [(x1 * x3) - 7.735 * div((x1 * x1), x2) - 180.0, 00060 4.0 - div(x3, x2) 00061 ]) 00062 g = np.maximum(g*-1, 0) 00063 00064 return np.array([f1] + list(g)) 00065 00066 @njit(fastmath=True) 00067 def re_3(x): 00068 x1, x2 = x[0], x[1] 00069 00070 f1 = x1 + (120 * x2) 00071 00072 E = 700000 00073 sigmaBMax = 700 00074 tauMax = 450 00075 deltaMax = 1.5 00076 sigmaK = (E * x1 * x1) / 100 00077 sigmaB = div(4500, (x1 * x2)) 00078 tau = div(1800, x2) 00079 delta = div(56.2 * 10000, E * x1 * x2 * x2) 00080 00081 g = np.array([ 00082 1 - (sigmaB / sigmaBMax), 00083 1 - (tau / tauMax), 00084 1 - (delta / deltaMax), 00085 1 - div(sigmaB, sigmaK) 00086 ]) 00087 g = np.maximum(g*-1, 0) 00088 00089 return np.array([f1] + list(g)) 00090 00091 @njit(fastmath=True) 00092 def re_4(x): 00093 x1, x2, x3, x4 = x[0], x[1], x[2], x[3] 00094 00095 P = 6000 00096 L = 14 00097 E = 30 * 1e6 00098 G = 12 * 1e6 00099 tauMax = 13600 00100 sigmaMax = 30000 00101 00102 f1 = (1.10471 * x1 * x1 * x2) + (0.04811 * x3 * x4) * (14.0 + x2) 00103 f2 = div(4 * P * L * L * L, E * x4 * x3 * x3 * x3) 00104 00105 M = P * (L + (x2 / 2)) 00106 tmpVar = ((x2 * x2) / 4.0) + np.power((x1 + x3) / 2.0, 2) 00107 R = np.sqrt(tmpVar) 00108 tmpVar = ((x2 * x2) / 12.0) + np.power((x1 + x3) / 2.0, 2) 00109 J = 2 * np.sqrt(2) * x1 * x2 * tmpVar 00110 00111 tauDashDash = div(M * R, J) 00112 tauDash = div(P, np.sqrt(2) * x1 * x2) 00113 tmpVar = tauDash * tauDash + div((2 * tauDash * tauDashDash * x2), (2 * R)) + (tauDashDash * tauDashDash) 00114 tau = np.sqrt(tmpVar) 00115 sigma = div(6 * P * L, x4 * x3 * x3) 00116 tmpVar = 4.013 * E * np.sqrt((x3 * x3 * x4 * x4 * x4 * x4 * x4 * x4) / 36.0) / (L * L) 00117 tmpVar2 = (x3 / (2 * L)) * np.sqrt(E / (4 * G)) 00118 PC = tmpVar * (1 - tmpVar2) 00119 00120 g = np.array([ 00121 tauMax - tau, 00122 sigmaMax - sigma, 00123 x4 - x1, 00124 PC - P 00125 ]) 00126 g = np.maximum(g*-1, 0) 00127 00128 return np.array([f1,f2] + list(g)) 00129 00130 @njit(fastmath=True) 00131 def re_5(x): 00132 x1, x2, x3, x4 = x[0], x[1], x[2], x[3] 00133 00134 f1 = 4.9 * 1e-5 * (x2 * x2 - x1 * x1) * (x4 - 1.0) 00135 f2 = div((9.82 * 1e6) * (x2 * x2 - x1 * x1), x3 * x4 * (x2 * x2 * x2 - x1 * x1 * x1)) 00136 00137 g = np.array([ 00138 (x2 - x1) - 20.0, 00139 0.4 - div(x3, (3.14 * (x2 * x2 - x1 * x1))), 00140 1.0 - div(2.22 * 1e-3 * x3 * (x2 * x2 * x2 - x1 * x1 * x1), np.power((x2 * x2 - x1 * x1), 2)), 00141 div(2.66 * 1e-2 * x3 * x4 * (x2 * x2 * x2 - x1 * x1 * x1), x2 * x2 - x1 * x1) - 900.0 00142 ]) 00143 g = np.maximum(g*-1, 0) 00144 00145 return np.array([f1,f2] + list(g)) 00146 00147 @njit(fastmath=True) 00148 def re_6(x): 00149 x1, x2, x3, x4 = np.round(x[0]), np.round(x[1]), np.round(x[2]), np.round(x[3]) 00150 00151 f1 = np.abs(6.931 - (div(x3, x1) * div(x4, x2))) 00152 f2 = np.max(np.array([x1, x2, x3, x4])) 00153 00154 g = np.array([0.5 - (f1 / 6.931)]) 00155 g = np.maximum(g*-1, 0) 00156 00157 return np.array([f1,f2] + list(g)) 00158 00159 @njit(fastmath=True) 00160 def re_7(x): 00161 xAlpha, xHA, xOA, xOPTT = x[0], x[1], x[2], x[3] 00162 00163 f1 = 0.692 + (0.477 * xAlpha) - (0.687 * xHA) - (0.080 * xOA) - (0.0650 * xOPTT) - (0.167 * xAlpha * xAlpha) - (0.0129 * xHA * xAlpha) + (0.0796 * xHA * xHA) - (0.0634 * xOA * xAlpha) - (0.0257 * xOA * xHA) + (0.0877 * xOA * xOA) - (0.0521 * xOPTT * xAlpha) + (0.00156 * xOPTT * xHA) + (0.00198 * xOPTT * xOA) + (0.0184 * xOPTT * xOPTT) 00164 f2 = 0.153 - (0.322 * xAlpha) + (0.396 * xHA) + (0.424 * xOA) + (0.0226 * xOPTT) + (0.175 * xAlpha * xAlpha) + (0.0185 * xHA * xAlpha) - (0.0701 * xHA * xHA) - (0.251 * xOA * xAlpha) + (0.179 * xOA * xHA) + (0.0150 * xOA * xOA) + (0.0134 * xOPTT * xAlpha) + (0.0296 * xOPTT * xHA) + (0.0752 * xOPTT * xOA) + (0.0192 * xOPTT * xOPTT) 00165 f3 = 0.370 - (0.205 * xAlpha) + (0.0307 * xHA) + (0.108 * xOA) + (1.019 * xOPTT) - (0.135 * xAlpha * xAlpha) + (0.0141 * xHA * xAlpha) + (0.0998 * xHA * xHA) + (0.208 * xOA * xAlpha) - (0.0301 * xOA * xHA) - (0.226 * xOA * xOA) + (0.353 * xOPTT * xAlpha) - (0.0497 * xOPTT * xOA) - (0.423 * xOPTT * xOPTT) + (0.202 * xHA * xAlpha * xAlpha) - (0.281 * xOA * xAlpha * xAlpha) - (0.342 * xHA * xHA * xAlpha) - (0.245 * xHA * xHA * xOA) + (0.281 * xOA * xOA * xHA) - (0.184 * xOPTT * xOPTT * xAlpha) - (0.281 * xHA * xAlpha * xOA) 00166 00167 return np.array([f1,f2,f3]) 00168 00169 00170 class RE1(object): 00171 ''' 00172 Four bar truss design 00173 NOTE: the provided true pareto front approximation of this problem might be wrong 00174 ''' 00175 n_var = 4 00176 n_obj = 2 00177 n_con = 0 00178 xl = [1, np.sqrt(2), np.sqrt(2), 1] 00179 xu = [3, 3, 3, 3] 00180 00181 def __call__(self, x): 00182 return re_1(x) 00183 00184 class RE2(object): 00185 ''' 00186 Reinforced concrete beam design 00187 ''' 00188 n_var = 3 00189 n_obj = 1 00190 n_con = 2 00191 xl = [0.2, 0, 0] 00192 xu = [15, 20, 40] 00193 00194 feasible_values = np.array([0.20, 0.31, 0.40, 0.44, 0.60, 0.62, 0.79, 0.80, 0.88, 0.93, 1.0, 1.20, 1.24, 1.32, 1.40, 1.55, 1.58, 1.60, 1.76, 1.80, 1.86, 2.0, 2.17, 2.20, 2.37, 2.40, 2.48, 2.60, 2.64, 2.79, 2.80, 3.0, 3.08, 3,10, 3.16, 3.41, 3.52, 3.60, 3.72, 3.95, 3.96, 4.0, 4.03, 4.20, 4.34, 4.40, 4.65, 4.74, 4.80, 4.84, 5.0, 5.28, 5.40, 5.53, 5.72, 6.0, 6.16, 6.32, 6.60, 7.11, 7.20, 7.80, 7.90, 8.0, 8.40, 8.69, 9.0, 9.48, 10.27, 11.0, 11.06, 11.85, 12.0, 13.0, 14.0, 15.0]) 00195 00196 def __call__(self, x): 00197 return re_2(x, self.feasible_values) 00198 00199 class RE3(object): 00200 ''' 00201 Hatch cover design 00202 ''' 00203 n_var = 2 00204 n_obj = 1 00205 n_con = 4 00206 xl = [0.5, 0.5] 00207 xu = [4, 50] 00208 00209 def __call__(self, x): 00210 return re_3(x) 00211 00212 class RE4(object): 00213 ''' 00214 Welded beam design 00215 ''' 00216 n_var = 4 00217 n_obj = 2 00218 n_con = 4 00219 xl = [0.125, 0.1, 0.1, 0.125] 00220 xu = [5, 10, 10, 5] 00221 00222 def __call__(self, x): 00223 return re_4(x) 00224 00225 class RE5(object): 00226 ''' 00227 Disc brake design 00228 ''' 00229 n_var = 4 00230 n_obj = 2 00231 n_con = 4 00232 xl = [55, 75, 1000, 11] 00233 xu = [80, 110, 3000, 20] 00234 00235 def __call__(self, x): 00236 return re_5(x) 00237 00238 class RE6(object): 00239 ''' 00240 Gear train design 00241 ''' 00242 n_var = 4 00243 n_obj = 2 00244 n_con = 1 00245 xl = [12] * 4 00246 xu = [60] * 4 00247 00248 def __call__(self, x): 00249 return re_6(x) 00250 00251 class RE7(object): 00252 ''' 00253 Rocket injector design 00254 ''' 00255 n_var = 4 00256 n_obj = 3 00257 n_con = 0 00258 xl = [0] * 4 00259 xu = [1] * 4 00260 00261 def __call__(self, x): 00262 return re_7(x) 00263 00264 from pymoo.core.problem import ElementwiseProblem 00265 from pymoo.algorithms.moo.nsga2 import NSGA2 00266 from pymoo.factory import get_sampling, get_crossover, get_mutation 00267 from pymoo.factory import get_termination 00268 00269 class RE1_pymoo(ElementwiseProblem): 00270 00271 def __init__(self, **kwargs): 00272 super().__init__(n_var=4, 00273 n_obj=2, 00274 n_constr=0, 00275 xl=np.array([1, np.sqrt(2), np.sqrt(2), 1]), 00276 xu=np.array([3, 3, 3, 3]), **kwargs) 00277 00278 def _evaluate(self, x, out, *args, **kwargs): 00279 y = re_1(x) 00280 out["F"] = [y[0], y[1]] 00281 00282 class RE4_pymoo(ElementwiseProblem): 00283 00284 def __init__(self, **kwargs): 00285 super().__init__(n_var=4, 00286 n_obj=2, 00287 n_constr=4, 00288 xl=np.array([0.125, 0.1, 0.1, 0.125]), 00289 xu=np.array([5, 10, 10, 5]), **kwargs) 00290 00291 def _evaluate(self, x, out, *args, **kwargs): 00292 y = re_4(x) 00293 out["F"] = [y[0], y[1]] 00294 out["G"] = [y[2], y[3], y[4], y[5]] 00295 00296 class RE5_pymoo(ElementwiseProblem): 00297 00298 def __init__(self, **kwargs): 00299 super().__init__(n_var=4, 00300 n_obj=2, 00301 n_constr=4, 00302 xl=np.array([55, 75, 1000, 11]), 00303 xu=np.array([80, 110, 3000, 20]), **kwargs) 00304 00305 def _evaluate(self, x, out, *args, **kwargs): 00306 y = re_5(x) 00307 out["F"] = [y[0], y[1]] 00308 out["G"] = [y[2], y[3], y[4], y[5]] 00309 00310 class RE6_pymoo(ElementwiseProblem): 00311 00312 def __init__(self, **kwargs): 00313 super().__init__(n_var=4, 00314 n_obj=2, 00315 n_constr=1, 00316 xl=np.array([12] * 4), 00317 xu=np.array([60] * 4), **kwargs) 00318 00319 def _evaluate(self, x, out, *args, **kwargs): 00320 y = re_6(x) 00321 out["F"] = [y[0], y[1]] 00322 out["G"] = [y[2]] 00323 00324 def check_pymoo(): 00325 00326 problem = RE5_pymoo() 00327 00328 algorithm = NSGA2( 00329 pop_size=64, 00330 n_offsprings=10, 00331 sampling=get_sampling("real_random"), 00332 crossover=get_crossover("real_sbx", prob=0.9, eta=15), 00333 mutation=get_mutation("real_pm", eta=20), 00334 eliminate_duplicates=True 00335 ) 00336 00337 termination = get_termination("n_gen", 5000) 00338 00339 from pymoo.optimize import minimize 00340 00341 res = minimize(problem, 00342 algorithm, 00343 termination, 00344 save_history=False, 00345 verbose=False) 00346 00347 X = res.X 00348 F = res.F 00349 00350 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 00351 xl, xu = problem.bounds() 00352 plt.figure(figsize=(7, 5)) 00353 plt.scatter(X[:, 0], X[:, 1], s=30, facecolors='none', edgecolors='r') 00354 plt.xlim(xl[0], xu[0]) 00355 plt.ylim(xl[1], xu[1]) 00356 plt.title("Design Space") 00357 00358 plt.figure(figsize=(7, 5)) 00359 plt.scatter(F[:, 0], F[:, 1], s=30, facecolors='none', edgecolors='blue') 00360 plt.title("Objective Space") 00361 plt.show() 00362 00363 def main(): 00364 00365 # check_pymoo() 00366 # sys.exit() 00367 00368 problems = [RE1(),RE2(),RE3(),RE4(),RE5(),RE6(),RE7()] 00369 names = ["RE1","RE2","RE3","RE4","RE5","RE6","RE7"] 00370 00371 for p in range(7): 00372 problem = problems[p] 00373 pname = "nsga_on100k_" + names[p] 00374 00375 # x, y = modecpp.minimize(mode.wrapper(problem, problem.n_obj), problem.n_obj, 0, 00376 # Bounds(problem.xl,problem.xu), popsize = 64, 00377 # max_evaluations = 100000, 00378 # nsga_update=True, 00379 # plot_name = pname, workers=16) 00380 00381 x, y = modecpp.retry(mode.wrapper(problem, problem.n_obj), problem.n_obj, problem.n_con, 00382 Bounds(problem.xl,problem.xu), popsize = 64, 00383 max_evaluations = 100000, 00384 nsga_update=True, num_retries = 16, 00385 workers=16) 00386 00387 np.savez_compressed(pname, xs=x, ys=y) 00388 moretry.plot(pname, problem.n_con, x, y, all=False, interp=True, plot3d=True) 00389 00390 if __name__ == '__main__': 00391 main()
